## `r fontawesome::fa("github", fill="#1e74ff")` [GitHub]{.copilot3} [Copilot]{.copilot3} {{< iconify copilot-16 >}} [(III) --]{.copilot3} [[chattr!!!]{.chatter}](https://mlverse.github.io/chattr/)

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)

# Create a histogram of penguin body mass
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 200, fill = "skyblue", color = "black") +
  labs(
    title = "Histogram of Penguin Body Mass",
    x = "Body Mass (g)",
    y = "Count"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
